text: انه كان لا يؤمن بالله العظيم

translations.translation: He used not to have iman in Allah the Magnificent,
He did not believe in God the supreme,
He would not believe in Allah, the Most Great;
they did not believe in the great God,
“Indeed he refused to accept faith in Allah, the Greatest.”
Verily, he used not to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
Surely he did not believe in Allah, the Great,
Behold, he never believed in God the All-mighty,
Lo! He used not to believe in Allah the Tremendous,
for he did not believe in Almighty God,
Verily he was wont not to believe in Allah, the Mighty.
Indeed he had no faith in Allah, the All-supreme,
This was he that would not believe in Allah Most High.
Verily, He used not to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
He did not believe in Allah, the Great,
For he would not believe in God the Great.
Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
[69:33] Lo! he never believed in God the Tremendous,
(Lo! he used not to believe in Allah the Tremendous) when he was in the life of the world,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وكيف لا يُعذب كذلك { إِنَّهُ } من كمال نخوته وتجبره { كَانَ لاَ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ } [الحاقة: 33] المستحق للعبودية والإيمان عتواً وعناداً؟!



ولا شك أن من تعظَّم على الله العلي العظيم فقد استحق أعظم العذاب، واستوجب أشد النكال
